summary: This is an email exchange between attorney Lilly Ann Sanchez and an unnamed recipient regarding J. Epstein. Sanchez is following up on a letter sent the previous night, expressing eagerness to finalize and move forward on an unspecified matter. The email includes standard legal disclaimers regarding tax advice and attorney-client privilege.
